languages.text:
The crew knows about the Drukhari hunting grounds and does not want to end up there.
There is a 15% chance to gain an additional shot while attacking with the ship {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
The crew knows about the Drukhari hunting grounds and does not want to end up there.
There is a 15% chance to gain an additional shot while attacking with the ship macro-cannons.

The crew knows about the Drukhari hunting grounds and does not want to end up there.
There is a 15% chance to gain an additional shot while attacking with the ship {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g}.

languages.text:
船员都听说过黑暗灵族的狩猎场，他们不想沦落到那个地方。
使用{g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}宏炮{/g}进行攻击时，有15%几率额外多开一炮。
languages.original_text:
The crew knows about the Drukhari hunting grounds and does not want to end up there.
There is a 15% chance to gain an additional shot while attacking with the ship {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
船员都听说过黑暗灵族的狩猎场，他们不想沦落到那个地方。
使用宏炮进行攻击时，有15%几率额外多开一炮。

languages.text:
Экипаж знает об охотничьих угодьях друкари и боится там оказаться.
При стрельбе из {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}макропушек{/g} с шансом 15% можно совершить дополнительный выстрел.
languages.original_text:
The crew knows about the Drukhari hunting grounds and does not want to end up there.
There is a 15% chance to gain an additional shot while attacking with the ship {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Экипаж знает об охотничьих угодьях друкари и боится там оказаться.
При стрельбе из макропушек с шансом 15% можно совершить дополнительный выстрел.

Экипаж знает об охотничьих угодьях друкари и боится там оказаться.
При стрельбе из макропушек с шансом 15% можно совершить дополнительный выстрел.

languages.text:
クルーはデュカーリ狩猟場について知っており、そこに行き着くことを望んでいない。
船の{g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}マクロキャノン{/g}の攻撃時に15%の確率で追加の射撃を行える。
languages.original_text:
The crew knows about the Drukhari hunting grounds and does not want to end up there.
There is a 15% chance to gain an additional shot while attacking with the ship {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
クルーはデュカーリ狩猟場について知っており、そこに行き着くことを望んでいない。
船の{g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}マクロキャノン{/g}の攻撃時に15%の確率で追加の射撃を行える。

languages.text:
La tripulación sabe de los terrenos de caza del Drukhari y no quiere acabar allí.
Hay un 15 % de probabilidad de efectuar un disparo adicional al atacar con los {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macrocañones{/g} de la nave.
languages.original_text:
The crew knows about the Drukhari hunting grounds and does not want to end up there.
There is a 15% chance to gain an additional shot while attacking with the ship {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
La tripulación sabe de los terrenos de caza del Drukhari y no quiere acabar allí.
Hay un 15 % de probabilidad de efectuar un disparo adicional al atacar con los {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macrocañones{/g} de la nave.

languages.text:
Die Crew weiß von den Jagdgründen der Drukhari und will dort nicht enden.
Bei Angriffen mit den {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}Makro-Kanonen{/g} des Schiffes besteht eine Chance von 15 %, einen zusätzlichen Schuss zu erhalten.
languages.original_text:
The crew knows about the Drukhari hunting grounds and does not want to end up there.
There is a 15% chance to gain an additional shot while attacking with the ship {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Die Crew weiß von den Jagdgründen der Drukhari und will dort nicht enden.
Bei Angriffen mit den Makrokanonen des Schiffes besteht eine Chance von 15 %, einen zusätzlichen Schuss zu erhalten.

languages.text:
L'équipage connaît les terrains de chasse des Drukharis et ne veut surtout pas s'y aventurer.
Toute attaque à l'aide des {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-canons{/g} du vaisseau a 15 % de chances de bénéficier d'un tir supplémentaire.
languages.original_text:
The crew knows about the Drukhari hunting grounds and does not want to end up there.
There is a 15% chance to gain an additional shot while attacking with the ship {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
L'équipage connaît les terrains de chasse des Drukhari et ne veut surtout pas s'y aventurer.
Toute attaque à l'aide des macro-canons du vaisseau a 15 % de chances de bénéficier d'un tir supplémentaire.

languages.text:
Mürettebat, Drukharilerin av bölgelerinden haberdar ve oraya düşmek istemiyorlar.
Geminin {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}makro toplarıyla{/g} saldırırken %15 oranla ilave bir yuva kazanma olasılığı.
languages.original_text:
The crew knows about the Drukhari hunting grounds and does not want to end up there.
There is a 15% chance to gain an additional shot while attacking with the ship {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g}.
